meanings.definition: The production and emission of light by a living organism.
meanings.sent1: The bioluminescences of fireflies light up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study bioluminescences in deep-sea creatures to understand their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The party in the forest was so dark that the bioluminescences of the mushrooms served as disco lights.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like bioluminescences, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The bioluminescences of the jellyfish created a magical underwater world.

meanings.definition: The phenomenon of light emission by living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The bioluminescences of certain fish help them attract prey in the dark ocean.
meanings.sent2: Bioluminescences in nature can be both beautiful and mysterious.
meanings.sent3: The campers were amazed by the bioluminescences of the glowing algae along the shore.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with bioluminescences, reflecting her excitement.
meanings.sent5: The forest at night was alive with the bioluminescences of fireflies and fungi.
